column3: Overdose deaths involving any drug, age-adjusted rate per 100,000 population
column4: Overdose deaths involving any opioid, age-adjusted rate per 100,000 population
column5: Overdose deaths involving heroin, age-adjusted rate per 100,000 population
column6: Overdose deaths involving opioid pain relievers (incl. illicitly produced opioids such as fentanyl), age-adjusted rate per 100,000 population
column7: Overdose deaths involving methadone, age-adjusted rate per 100,000 population
column8: Overdose deaths involving synthetic opioids other than methadone (incl. illicitly produced opioids such as fentanyl), age-adjusted rate per 100,000 population
